https://tmrev.io/movie/503242-40 Years in the Making: The Magic Music Movie 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/225wUoueqae5lCxkcZiSoc8pAO8.jpg TV writer/producer Lee Aronsohn tracks down the scattered members of a beloved early 1970's band with the hope that, 40 years after they broke up, he can get them to play one last show. 40 Years in the Making: The Magic Music Movie
